summary: This document consists of Bureau of Prisons administrative forms from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, dated August 9-10, 2019. It includes a count sheet, an out-count form, and an inmate roster. The roster lists inmates by registration number and housing unit, with one inmate notably flagged for suicide watch. These are routine prison operational records from the facility where Jeffrey Epstein was held.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The document is a prison administrative record from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York where Jeffrey Epstein was incarcerated. His presence is implied as the subject of the facility's records during this period.

events.title: Inmate Roster and Suicide Watch
events.description: An inmate roster from MCC New York shows several inmates, including one with registration number 86409-054, assigned to a suicide watch housing unit (E05-535L).

events.title: Prison Population Count
events.description: A Bureau of Prisons count sheet records a total inmate population of 758 at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, with counts broken down by housing unit.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY
keyFacts: Document is dated August 9-10, 2019, from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York.
An inmate roster dated August 9, 2019, lists an inmate (REG NO 86409-054) on 'SUICIDE OR' status in housing unit E05-535L.
A population count sheet dated August 10, 2019, records a total of 758 inmates at the facility.
These are standard Bureau of Prisons administrative forms (Count Sheet, Out-Count Form, Inmate Roster) used for daily prison operations.
